name: Hero Arena
description:
Enter the arena with the hero to collect as much gold as you can. But watch out, you're not on the side of the hero. 

A game where you have to stay alive as long as you can while the hero tries to kill you and your teammates. Your allies will drop gold which you can collect for points. 

Bring gold to the chest to increase your points. You can use gold to buy upgrades, potions, and stronger allies. 

This game is intended to be played in full-screen mode. It's playable without full-screen, but better as full-screen. 

Controls:

Shift to run (needs running shoes)

Space to pick up gold

WASD or arrows to move
